postScript:
:SET &RID# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*EXITCODE=*")
:PROCESS &RID#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&RID#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &EXITCODE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &EXITCODE# = ADD(&EXITCODE#,1)
:  SET &EXITCODE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&EXITCODE#)
:  PUBLISH &EXITCODE#,,WORKFLOW
!:  IF &EXITCODE# > 0
!:    MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1800
!:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS

:SET &LHND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*LOGFILE=*")
:PROCESS &LHND#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&LHND#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &LOG_FILE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &LOG_FILE# = ADD(&LOG_FILE#,1)
:  SET &LOG_FILE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&LOG_FILE#)
:  PUBLISH &LOG_FILE#,,TOP
:ENDPROCESS
preScript:
:DEFINE &IAGENTS#,string,2
:DEFINE &OAGENTS#,string,2
:DEFINE &AAGENT#,string,3

:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB('${IN_AGENT#}', '[','')
:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB(&TMP#, ']','')
:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB(&TMP#, '"','')

:FILL &IAGENTS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&TMP#,",")
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&IAGENTS#[])

:SET &DELAY# = 60
:SET &CHECK_COUNT# = 1
:SET &CHECK_COUNT_MAX# = 10

:WHILE &CHECK_COUNT# LE &CHECK_COUNT_MAX#
:  SET &RUNVAR# = 1
:  SET &ALIVE_COUNT# = 0
:  SET &CHECK_COUNT_F# = FORMAT(&CHECK_COUNT#)
:  PRINT "Checking agents status &CHECK_COUNT_F# time(s) ..."
:  WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:    FILL &AAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(&IAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#],".")
:    SET &AGENT_UC# = "&AAGENT#[1]"
:    SET &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#] = "&AGENT_UC#.os"
:    SET &AGENT_ALIVE# = SYS_HOST_ALIVE(&OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#])
:    IF &AGENT_ALIVE# = "Y"
:      SET &ALIVE_COUNT# = &ALIVE_COUNT# + 1
:    ENDIF
:    SET &RUNVAR_F# = FORMAT(&RUNVAR#)
:    PRINT "Agent &RUNVAR_F#: &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#], Alive: &AGENT_ALIVE#"
:    SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:  ENDWHILE
:  IF &ALIVE_COUNT# > 0
:    SET &CHECK_COUNT# =  &CHECK_COUNT_MAX#
:  ELSE
:    SET &DELAY_F# = FORMAT(&DELAY#)
:    PRINT "&DELAY_F# seconds waiting for next check"
:    WAIT &DELAY#
:  ENDIF
: SET &CHECK_COUNT# = &CHECK_COUNT# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:IF &ALIVE_COUNT# > 0
:  SET &AGENT_ALIVE# = "Y"
:ELSE
:  SET &AGENT_ALIVE# = "N"
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &AGENT_ALIVE#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &RUNVAR# = 1

:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:  FILL &AAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(&IAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#],".")
:  SET &AGENT_UC# = "&AAGENT#[1]"
:  SET &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#] = "&AGENT_UC#.os"
:  SET &AGENT_ALIVE# = SYS_HOST_ALIVE(&OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#])
:  PRINT "Agent &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#], Alive: &AGENT_ALIVE#"
:  IF &AGENT_ALIVE# = "Y"
:    SET &AGENT# = &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#]
:    PUB &AGENT#
:    SET &RUNVAR# = &LEN# + 1
:  ENDIF
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:DEFINE &APAGENT#,string,2
:SET &DATE# = SYS_DATE("YYYYMMDD",&TZ#)
:SET &TIME# = SYS_TIME("HHMMSS",&TZ#)

:FILL &APAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(&AGENT#,".")
:SET &PAGENT# = STR_LC("&APAGENT#[1]")

:SET &TMP1# = "${IN_PARAMETERS#}"
:IF &TMP1# <> ""
:SET &XPARAMETERS# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&TMP1#, "%DATE%", &DATE#)
:SET &XPARAMETERS# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&XPARAMETERS#, "%TIME%", &TIME#)
:SET &XPARAMETERS# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&XPARAMETERS#, "%AGENT%", &PAGENT#)
:PUB &XPARAMETERS#
:ENDIF

processingCommand.script:
:IF ${AGENT_ALIVE#} = "N"
:STOP MSG,3,NODE_IS_DOWN
:ENDIF


echo ">> Instance: ${IN_INSTANCE#}"
echo ">> Module: ${IN_MODULE#}"
echo ">> Machine Function: ${IN_MACHINE_FUNCTION#}"
echo ">> Hostname: `hostname`"
echo ">> Shell: $SHELL"
echo ">> Username: `whoami`"
echo ">> Parameters: ${XPARAMETERS#}"
echo ">> Executing: ${IN_SCRIPT_NAME#} ${XPARAMETERS#}"
echo ">> Script output: "
${IN_SCRIPT_NAME#} ${XPARAMETERS#}
EXITCODE=$?
if [[ $EXITCODE -eq 2 ]]; then
  EXITCODE=0
  echo ">> Warning: Script exited with exitcode 2!"
  echo "EXITCODE=$EXITCODE"
else
  echo "EXITCODE=$EXITCODE"
fi
exit $EXITCODE
